title: Using HealthLake as an Event Producer (CDC)
description: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/golang-handler.html is fantastic datastore when working with Healthcare data, especially data that is Patient centric.  It comes with a robust API, many integrations to other AWS services and is purely hands-off (serverless).  By adding CDC capabilities it can also be used to extend data beyond it's storage.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: When using this pattern, https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/golang-handler.html becomes not only a consumer of data but also a producer. By adding this capability to https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/golang-handler.html, it can be put in the center of a modern distributed Healthcare application and serve as an ingress and egress point.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
